entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:23 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of light snow this morning and ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
